name: Thitipol Panyalimpanun
body:
# Thitipol Panyalimpanun
Hi! My name is Thitipol. I'm a freelance writer and Digital Media student at NYU. I write about Thai art and culture for AsianCorrespondent.com. I'm also interested in data-driven journalism. Check out some of my work below or reach me at p.thitipol[at]gmail.com.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
